    Method
    Description
    private void
    confirmReturn()
    This method retrieves the original sale information and inserts a new record into sales_history with a negative total price and sale type set to "Return".

  • Method Details

    • setUserCredentials

      public void setUserCredentials(String username, String password)
      Sets the current user's login credentials.
      Parameters:
      username - The cashier's email or username.
      password - The cashier's password.

    • setConnection

      public void setConnection(Connection conn)
      Sets the database connection and initializes recent order history.
      Parameters:
      conn - The active Connection to the database.

    • switchScene

      public void switchScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String title) throws IOException
      Switches the scene to a new FXML page and ensures the new controller retains the existing database connection and user credentials.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggering the scene change.
      title - The path to the FXML file representing the target scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the FXML file cannot be loaded.

    • goLoginPage

      private void goLoginPage(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Redirects the user to the login page.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggering the navigation.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the FXML file cannot be loaded.

    • goCashierPage

      private void goCashierPage(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Redirects the user back to the cashier page.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggering the navigation.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the FXML file cannot be loaded.

    • getEmployeeID

      private Integer getEmployeeID(Connection conn, String username, String password)
      Retrieves the employee ID corresponding to the provided credentials.
      Parameters:
      conn - The active database connection.
      username - The employee's username (email).
      password - The employee's password.
      Returns:
      The employee's ID if found

    • initPrevOrders

      private void initPrevOrders()
      Initializes and displays the most recent 20 entries from sales_history. This is called automatically when the controller is initialized.

    • showPrevOrders

      private void showPrevOrders()
      Displays detailed order information for a given Sales ID, including drink details such as size, toppings, sweetness, and ice level.

    • confirmReturn

      private void confirmReturn()
      This method retrieves the original sale information and inserts a new record into sales_history with a negative total price and sale type set to "Return".
